body.name: Liberty Imports My First Cartoon RC Remote Control Cars for Toddlers Ages 1-3, Radio Control Toy for Baby, Kids 18 Months+ (2 Pack)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 22 hrs 18 mins
features: PERFECT FOR TODDLERS: This Cartoon RC Car is the ideal beginner remote control car toy for 1-3 year old boys & girls, promising high-speed fun and engaging play!
FIRST RC TOY: Specifically designed as a child's first remote control toy car, this model opens the door to a thrilling world of play for your little one ages 18 Months and up!

EASY TO CONTROL: 2 Channel remote control for forward and reverse left. Super cute and easy to use, this cartoon car comes with a steering wheel shaped RC controller with only 2 big buttons for simplistic control.
SOUNDS & LIGHTS: Engage your child's senses with our car's honking sounds, music, and flashing headlights, providing a complete interactive fun experience.
REMOVABLE FIGURES: Comes with removable driver figurines that your kid can put in the driver's seat or play with on its own for even more imaginative excitement during playtime!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 2 Channel Beginners Cartoon R/C Cars NEWEST UPDATED VERSION on the kids remote control racing cars! This remote control race car is bright, colorful, and ideal for young children learning to play with remote control toys for the first time. Press a button and the car will honk and play music while the headlights blink. Easy 2 button controls make driving easy while a bunch of fun buttons keeps your child intrigued! Functions: forward & reverse leftBendable controller antenna for child safetyVehicles have different frequencies, so two players can play together.Police Car frequency: 27 MHz, Race Car frequency: 49MHzMusic and honking sound effects can be turned on/off

Perfect for Toddlers Quintessential for young children and toddlers beginning to play with remote control toys for the first time. Vehicles have different frequencies, so two players can play together. The cars are easily maneuvered and the buttons are made simple to press, rendering them perfect for small children. The remote has been crafted with big simple buttons allowing to speed left, right, forward, and reverse. Highest Quality ABS Plastic. Safe for Kids. Recommended Ages 18 months and up.

About Us Strong Durable Our premium quality toys are built to last! They're made with superior quality materials and are rigorously built for quality, leading to a toy unmatched in quality and durability. It's sure to withstand all the banging and clanging kids will love to put it through. Safe and Fun From the initial toy concept to the final product for sale at retail, safety is built into every toy. When it comes to the toys in our children's hands, what could possibly be more important than safety? Choose only the best for your child! Our Commitment We are fully dedicated to providing you with the best in fun, innovative toys. Our passion is to help families have fun and build great memories through play. We are committed to producing and selling high-quality products to satisfy our customers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little car!
reviews.reviewText: This is the perfect car for my year old grandson. Very easy to use, works great, and is a lot of fun!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect beginners RC car!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I have a few RC cars, but wanted something my 2 year old could manage.This car comes with a remote that has 2 buttons, one for going forward. And the other for turning around. It’s very easy to manage, and the car itself is very quick and responsive to the remote.The car has 3 drivers that you can switch out. The car also has a button that plays a cute upbeat song.The remote and car are very sturdy and have withstand being dropped/accidentally kicked - they are toddler proof!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My 1 year old loves this toy!!! I'm 33 and I also find it fun to drive
reviews.reviewText: This is the little engine that could. It is very fast and a ton of fun. There are only 2 buttons on the remote so it was easy to show my 1 year old how to use it. She is able to drive it herself but sometimes needs/wants my help. It is very fast and on a wood floor you can make it spin and drift. It's a little kids toy but I have fun driving it too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2014
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute, Easy to Operate, but Possessed
reviews.reviewText: I bought this toy for my 15-month old daughter. It's mostly great, she loves it. It's cute, sturdy and easy to operate. There are only two buttons. The first makes the car move forward in a straight line. The second moves the car backward and turns the car. There's no other steering. It zips around on our laminate floors and plush rugs.This toy requires a total of five AA batteries (None are included.) Two go in the remote control and three go in the car. The battery life seems reasonable. The range to control the car is about 10 feet. Nothing too crazy, but plenty for a little one.This toy is a little noisy. It has an engine sound and a siren that play when buttons are pushed on the car. It also has a little song that plays when the driver's seat is pushed down, which happens frequently when the car crashes. It kind of sounds like Tetris music with a Cha Cha. It gets a little annoying after a while (especially when my husband starts whistling it- but that's not your problem). You can mostly make the song go away by removing "Mr Police Officer" from the car.The sound can not really be controlled. There are no volume buttons and no setting to make the car respond to the remote control without the noises also being available. The sounds can not be activated by the steering wheel.Our car seems to be... possessed. Well maybe not, but it does randomly move when the power is on to the car. It just kind of jumps a few inches. It's a little unnerving at first, but I can't say it's the only possessed baby toy in the house. Maybe it's the house.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Son loves it. Perfect first remote control car.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Takes a beating!
reviews.reviewText: This sturdy little car is just adorable. My 2 year old grandson can push the buttons easily. It runs very well on our carpet. This little guy is a good value for the price and continues to run well despite a rough and tumble 2 year old! Would highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for toddlers
reviews.reviewText: This car is so much fun for a toddler! It’s easy to use and drive!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Warning for kids with long hair!
reviews.reviewText: This product is nice and fun. My toddler loves it very much. It is easy to remote control the airplane since it only has two buttons. One button to go forward and one to go backwards. Fairly easy for a toddler to handle. Product says is good for 18 months and older. My son is 19 months and it's easy for him to use. Overall the quality for the toy is fair for the price. The only reason I gave it a 3 star is because it can be a little dangerous. WARNING for kids that have long hair parents please supervise child at all times. My son has long hair that is right above his shoulders. One day he picked up the toy to place it at the other side of the room and pressed the button. While holding the airplane toy, his hair got caught with the tire as the tire was spinning. The second time his hair was caught it was by the propeller. Everytime his hair was caught it wasn't easy to untangle his hair. I had to grab some scissors to cut his hair off. I decided to write this review for parents that have their toddlers with long hair. Child may be to young to understand not to put car anywhere near his ear. Either to listen to noise the product makes or just to simply carry it from one place to another. I tools the product away from my son and will wait until he understands that the product must not go anywhere near his hair.
Couldnt work after moving a few centimeters.

reviews.reviewTitle: One not working right out the box
reviews.reviewText: Just got these delivered for my son's birthday. Unfortunately one of them doesn't work. The one that works is pretty good, my older child worked it out pretty quickly, younger one still trying, but it's disappointing that one is already not working.
The hind right side wheel just came off after hardly a few runs.
